artists.biography: John Lennon was a British musician, singer and songwriter, who gained worldwide fame as a co-founder of the Beatles.
Robert De Niro is an American actor, producer, and director. He is regarded as one of the greatest actors of his generation.
Ellen DeGeneres is an American comedian, television host, actress, and producer. She is known for her stand-up comedy and her talk show.
Madonna is an American singer, songwriter, and actress. She is known for pushing the boundaries of songwriting in mainstream popular music.
Meryl Streep is an American actress. She is often described as the best actress of her generation.
Robin Williams was an American stand-up comedian and actor. He was known for his improvisational skills and the wide variety of characters he created.
Jimi Hendrix was an American rock guitarist, singer, and songwriter. He is widely regarded as one of the most influential electric guitarists in the history of popular music.
Leonardo DiCaprio is an American actor, producer, and environmentalist. He is known for his roles in films such as Titanic, Inception, and The Revenant.
Tina Fey is an American actress, comedian, writer, and producer. She is known for her work on Saturday Night Live and 30 Rock.
Freddie Mercury was a British singer, songwriter, and record producer. He was the lead vocalist of the rock band Queen.
